original_text: The person who gives the gift to the Lord must also give a gift of flour. He must mix the flour with oil. It should be 1 kilogram of your best flour. Mix this flour with 1 litre of olive oil.
korean_text: 그러한 헌물을 드리는 자는 고운 가루 십분의 일에 기름 사분의 일 힌을 섞어 여호와께 소제로 드릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: The person who gives the gift to the Lord
must also give a gift of flour
He must mix the flour with oil
It should be 1 kilogram of your best flour
Mix this flour with 1 litre of olive oil
